tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Vidheya Venkatesh was assigned to us as the Paediatrician for our child born in cloudnine hospital.Ever since we are consulting him.My son had jaundice for around 6-8 weeks n his bilrubin levels were around 16 initially.Dr Vidheya did not scare us and did not recommend phototherapy unnecessarily.i have heard some doctors scare even when the levels are around 10.He doesn't scare us n doesn't suggest big treatments unnecessarily as against what we would expect from doctors in big hospitals.He is very patient and answers our queries well.He also responds to queries on WhatsApp which is highly appreciable.

I do believe he is a good doctor but I was truly disappointed with the vaccination experience for my baby. I am not sure if this should be attributed to the doctor or the hospital. If there is a way I can give thumbs up to my consultation experience separately, I would have done so.I went for 7th month vaccination which was just influenza shot. Even before consultation, nurse came with the prescription to buy vaccine which was surprising as up until then, vaccine is prescribed only after clearing the baby. When the vaccine amount was high, we were surprised as it was only supposed to be influenza. But with vaccine bought, we went to see the doc where we asked if it’s just influenza and he said no we are doing typhoid as well. He said your book is outdated (trust me it’s been only 7 months since the baby was born), now typhoid should be given btw 6-12 months and we at cloud nine give it at 7th month..we weren’t too sure abt it but we are not experts and doctor is saying this and he has not given us an option to think about it coz we were told to buy the vaccination before consultation. So this is my problem here. We are coming here for our baby’s immunisation and we want the best for her but there is a level of trust that needs to be established and that was not there. If doctor is going outside the book, shouldn’t the parents be aware of it before purchasing the vaccination. Then the parents can actually digest that information and probably ask for time to wait on this particular vaccine, just saying. I went ahead and checked couple of my relatives *** ******** *********** **** *** ********* *** ***** *** ******* ******* ** **** ****** * **** ***** *** ******** *** ******** ******* ************ ***** *** ******* ******* ** ** **** ****** ** *** ******** ********** **** *** ** ***** ***** ******* ** **** * **** ******* **** ** ******** ******* ******* ******** *** **** ********* ** ***** ******** **** * *** ****, atleast we need to be informed of the decision. Now my baby never had fever after vaccinations before *** **** **** *** *** **** **** ****** ******** *** ******* ********* *** ***** ******* ****** **** ***** **** * ******* ** ***** *** ***** But I am sensible enough not to write a bad review bcos of common side effects of vaccine but I truly believe if he had consulted first and told she needs typhoid vaccine now as opposed to the immunisation chart of India and convinced us, it would have been a different story. No this they told while they were opening the vacc medicines. I kind of feel buying the medicine before consultation was a way for them to expedite the consultation but with kind of premium consultation charges they levy on us, though ours might be a straight forward vaccination consultation, we really wish it was handled better.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Not very good, works for hospital,, not for wellness of Patients. 
He is like a robot, reading all the instructions step by step as mentioned on his iPad. 
Doesn’t give any personalised advice. 

Got my newborn admitted for Jaundice, ** ****** ***** ** *** *** *** **** **** ** *** ***** *** *** *** **** admitted right away.  
Which we did, but at the time of discharge he never tells you how to take care of the same 
He will just tell you that u might need to admit the baby again, Jaundice might reappear 
Does give you preventive actions. Not at all recommended.

Cloud 9 facility is overall good in terms cleanliness and hygiene. They have great team of gynecologist.
*** ** **** ******* **** *** ************ ********* ** **** ****** ****** ** *** ****** **** ***** **** ***** **Dr Prashant and Dr Vidya at HRBR layout are arrogant insensitive *** ******** ******** They don't even bother to update the parents with child health status and you need to chase them for the updates. *** *** *** **** **** **** ** **** ****** ** **** ** ****  ***** ****** Dr Vidya words " if we feel that mother is confident enough then only we will discharge the baby. They will boost up mother confidence by keeping child in NICU * * **** ** *** ****** ***** *** *** *** *** ****** ** ********* ***** * ****** *** *** ************ *** ****** ******* ******* *** *** *** ****

I know this comment will not make much difference *** ********** **** **** **** ****** ******** **** *** *********

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Consultation provided for all pediatric disease,
review:
We took our kid to Dr Vidheya Venkatesh for cold, dry cough and fever and doctor suggested some syrups.. 
Though we have used syrups for 2 days ** ********* ***** ** ** ****** ******* we see our kid is coughing more.. **** * ******* ***** ***** ***** *** **** ** **** **** *** ***** **** *** ***** **** ******* ******** ****** **** ********* ***** *** *** ***** ******* ** *** ******* 

As everyone thinks that health is more important and we prefer best hospital by paying 850 rupees for consulting doctor.. But we had bad experience.* **** ********** ** ** ****** ******** ******** ********* *** ******* ******** *********** 

Thank you!

review: Great listening skills and the treatment works perfectly. Natural remedies are an addition. Dr. Vidheya’s friendliness and quick response is a gift to the parents.
